com.google.android.exoplayer.upstream

Interface UriDataSource

  • All Superinterfaces:
    DataSource
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    HttpDataSource
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AssetDataSource, ContentDataSource, DefaultHttpDataSource, DefaultUriDataSource, FileDataSource

    public interface UriDataSource
extends DataSource
    A component that provides media data from a URI.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getUri()
      When the source is open, returns the URI from which data is being read.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.google.android.exoplayer.upstream.DataSource

        close, open, read

    • Method Detail

      • getUri

        String getUri()
        When the source is open, returns the URI from which data is being read.

        If redirection occurred, the URI after redirection is the one returned.

        Returns:
        When the source is open, the URI from which data is being read. Null otherwise.
